A2 (symbol €) the unit of money used in most European Union countries: You can usually find a hotel for €70 a night. I need to change my pounds into euros. a 20-euro note the euro
the value of the euro, used in comparing the values of different types of money from around the world: The euro fell/rose against (= was worth less/more compared to) the pound today.
